channel.title: deficit on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in deficit on FinanClub

item.title: South African Current-Account Deficit Narrows More Than Expected
item.description: South Africa’s Current-Account Deficit Narrows South Africa’s current-account deficit narrowed to 2.2% of gross domestic product (GDP) in the first quarter of 2023, from 3.2% in the fourth quarter of 2022. The narrowing of the deficit was driven by a decline in imports, which fell by 10.

item.title: OECD Signals Tax Cuts Probably Out of Reach for UK Government
item.description: OECD Says Tax Cuts Unlikely for UK Government The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) has said that tax cuts are unlikely for the UK government in the near future. The OECD said that the UK government needs to focus on reducing the deficit and debt, rather than cutting taxes.
